thread.title: It's Take Your Mom to the Oscars Day for Lucas Hedges and Dev Patel
thread.title_full: It's Take Your Mom to the Oscars Day for Lucas Hedges and Dev Patel

author: Nardine Saad
title: It's Take Your Mom to the Oscars Day for Lucas Hedges and Dev Patel
text:
Feb. 26, 2017, 4:46 p.m. It's Take Your Mom to the Oscars Day for Lucas Hedges and Dev Patel Nardine Saad (Allen J. Schaben / Los Angeles Times) 
The 89th Academy Awards were a family affair on Sunday. The go-to Oscars date for a few first-time nominees came in the maternal variety. 
Like Leonardo DiCaprio and Bradley Cooper before them, "Manchester by the Sea" supporting actor nominee Lucas Hedges got a sweetly embarrassing smooch from his mother, poet and actress Susan Titman, for all to see, "Moana" original song nominee Lin-Manual Miranda was accompanied by his mother, Dr. Luz Towns-Miranda, and "Lion" supporting actor nominee Dev Patel was joined by his mom, Anita Patel. (Tre'vell Anderson / Los Angeles Times) (Amy Kaufman / Los Angeles Times) Latest updates
